name: Justin Time & The Mystery of Gouda Gulch
name_original: Justin Time & The Mystery of Gouda Gulch
description:
The ranch of Old West gunslinger Justin Time has been up for grabs for years… 

A beautifully restored ranch mansion with gorgeous acres of land. Anyone who finds the deed can claim ownership to it, but it’s been lost over 50 years. As rumor has it, though, it is buried somewhere on the property...

You’ve decided to take it upon yourself to have a look, and try to claim the place for your own. But the mansion seems to have more than one secret to be uncovered... 

Credits:

Patrick Persin - Producer

Tyler Sloss - Programmer
